nodes.text: Starfeld Industries was a company that manufactured the ZH-40 Tribune-class light freighter and the older ZH-25 Questor-class freighter.

Starfeld Industries was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the article "A Buyer's Guide to Alternative Starships", which was written by Stephen Luminati and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 5 in 1995.
